price: Nokorε sε abirabͻ a εwͻ adesaeε ne adekyeε mu, ne nneεma a Nyankopͻn abͻ a εwͻ soro ne asaase soͻ no (nyinaa) yε nsεnkyerεnee dema amanfoͻ a wͻsuro Nyame yε ahwεyie.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna fī ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri wamā khalaqa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin liqawmin yattaqūna
